system.description:
Also at 3rd level, one of your creations has come to life, suffused with all of your creativity. This @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.6nLPBh5IC87p2x0b]{Awakened Toy} may be a doll, a toy soldier, puppet, or a clockwork contraption. This toy functions as a familiar conjured by the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6l4bmc7ovgcn2c9k]{Find Familiar}, but it has the construct creature type and the statistics of a homunculus, with the following improvements:

  • Whenever your awakened toy rolls initiative, it gains a number of temporary hit points equal to your artificer level × your proficiency bonus.
  • Your awakened toy’s AC increases by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus.
  • Your awakened toy adds your proficiency bonus to its attack and damage rolls.

If your awakened toy drops to 0 hit points it does not disappear, but rather falls inert. It takes you 1 hour of repairing it with tinkerer’s tools or woodcarver’s tools to bring it back to life, which may be performed as part of a short or a long rest.
